mapper.select: SELECT b.rnum, b.ml_no ml_no, b.ml_time ml_time, b.ml_title ml_title, b.ml_tel ml_tel, b.ml_price ml_price, b.ml_newaddr ml_newaddr, b.ml_oldaddr ml_oldaddr, b.ml_menu ml_menu, b.ml_tag ml_tag, b.ml_count ml_count FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rnum, a.ml_no, a.ml_time, a.ml_title, a.ml_tel, a.ml_price, a.ml_newaddr, a.ml_oldaddr, a.ml_menu, a.ml_tag, a.ml_count FROM (SELECT ml_no, ml_time, ml_title, ml_tel, ml_price, ml_newaddr, ml_oldaddr, ml_menu, ml_tag, ml_count FROM ie_mainlist ORDER BY ml_no desc ) a WHERE (ml_title like '%'||#{contents}||'%' or ml_tag like '%'||#{contents}||'%') AND rownum <=5) b WHERE b.rnum >=1

SELECT b.rnum, b.ml_no ml_no, b.ml_time ml_time, b.ml_title ml_title, b.ml_tel ml_tel, b.ml_price ml_price, b.ml_newaddr ml_newaddr, b.ml_oldaddr ml_oldaddr, b.ml_menu ml_menu, b.ml_tag ml_tag, b.ml_count ml_count FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rnum, a.ml_no, a.ml_time, a.ml_title, a.ml_tel, a.ml_price, a.ml_newaddr, a.ml_oldaddr, a.ml_menu, a.ml_tag, a.ml_count FROM (SELECT ml_no, ml_time, ml_title, ml_tel, ml_price, ml_newaddr, ml_oldaddr, ml_menu, ml_tag, ml_count FROM ie_mainlist ORDER BY ml_no desc ) a WHERE (ml_title like '%'||#{contents}||'%' or ml_tag like '%'||#{contents}||'%') AND rownum <=#{num}+5) b WHERE b.rnum >#{num}

SELECT b.rnum, b.sb_no bno, b.sb_mno mno, b.sb_title title, b.sb_content content, b.sb_date sbDate, b.sb_views views
FROM (SELECT a.rnum, a.sb_no bno, a.sb_mno mno, a.sb_title title, a.sb_content content, a.sb_date sbDate, a.sb_views views FROM (SELECT sb_no bno, (SELECT m_id FROM ie_member WHERE m_no = sb_mno) mid, sb_title title, sb_content content, sb_date sbDate, sb_views views FROM ie_mainlist ORDER BY ml_no desc ) a WHERE (ml_title like '%'||#{contents}||'%' or ml_tag like '%'||#{contents}||'%') AND rownum <=5) b WHERE b.rnum >=1
